TopicTitle: What do you want to see in .23

Articles.Content: So what do you guys want to see in .23? I want monkeys
I want what ever there puting in the .23 update . Just kiding. I would like to see the money part of carer (sorry for spelling) mode, or resourses.
I still want my pintles and gudgeons!
Better aerodynamics and money!
A few more bug fixes would be nice.
Is there anyone here who would object or not use pintles and gudgeons?

I would like there to be a Kerbal dancing animation. Once I plant a flag, I want Jeb to do a little victory jig.

Resources and career mode money would be nice, but those are minor in comparison.
Enhanced IVAs would be my dream. Then my space station can be used to its full potential.
Aliens, weapons, krussians, multiplayer...
There is not a single one of you on this forum that does not use pintles and gudgeons every single day. Many times!
Space station parts, station solar panels, and you can fly around inside them
Saturn, Neptune, Uranus and Pluto. Other than that enhanced IVA's and more Space Station parts.
MONEY! so I can plunge my space program into hopeless debt by launching stuff into the sun.

I usually see these threads posted a week after a new update, or maybe even a few days, but... before release?

You guys are really anxious aren't you

There is not a single one of you on this forum that does not use pintles and gudgeons every single day. Many times!

Yes Whackjob... I know what a hinge is

But I agree, some moving parts would be very nice to have.

Moving crew on the same craft around spaces, more parts, aerodynamics improvement (might not be so hard to do for them anyway, was done with mods), optimization, more celestial bodies, really, everything is welcome, I'd really love to see Squad's imagination at it's maximum in the next updates.
I want less people to ask what's coming out in .24 before .23 is released.

I want to see them fix all those bugs they introduced in 0.22. It's completely unforgivaeable that they left us with the complete broken feature of... hold on, I'm just getting some new information... yes, I see... not released, you say... very well, then.

Based on this new information, I would like to see 0.22 before I provide useless speculation on 0.23.
IVA movements and science. It is the only next logical step.

Resources.

But I'm expecting:

mission system and money

more biome planets

more science flavor text

maybe some more art passes on planets like they did with Kerbin and the Mun.

more optimizations

fixing the easter eggs if they didn't do it in .22 and add science results for getting close to them.
Clouds and weather!
As long as they never implement Congress, I'll be happy with whatever they put into the program.

A government to bring your budget so low that you can barely afford to send a payload of 15 tons into orbit!

In all seriousness, though, I'm going to wait until I get my hands on 0.22 before I speculate on 0.23.

More planets and moons. It's been so so long since the last addition.

That and more career progress. Perhaps money and missions/contracts.

Now i'll start off by saying i don't condone this thread being out there before 0.22 is even out BUT!

with that said and with what i've seen from 0.22, i'd say the budget/money system would be what i'd like to see
